title: Happiness
type: A breve, also known as a breve latte or a caffe breve, is an espresso based coffee drink.

title: Family
type: Café au lait is coffee with hot milk added. It differs from white coffee, which is coffee with cold milk or other whiteners added.

title: Wealth
type: Iced coffee is a coffee beverage served cold. It may be prepared either by brewing coffee normally and then serving it over ice.

title: Peace
type: Espresso con panna, which means 'espresso with cream' in Italian, is a single or double shot of espresso

title: Better grades
type: A flat white is a coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles and a glossy or velvety consistency).

title: Health
type: Frappé coffee, an iced coffee beverage made from instant coffee originally from Greece

title: Love
type: Caffee Americano, a style of coffee prepared by adding hot water to espresso

title: Balance
type: Caffee Americano, a style of coffee prepared by adding hot water to espresso
